## Resident Construction Services - Escuminac Wharf Reconstruction
### Tender Reference: WS4498379964-Doc4498384742

#### Government of Canada's Tender Announcement
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit their proposals for the Resident Construction Services for the Escuminac Wharf Reconstruction Project in New Brunswick, on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO-SCH).

#### Project Description
This project involves the reconstruction of the Escuminac Wharf in New Brunswick. A request for proposals (RFP) is being issued against Supply Arrangement EB129-192368 for Heavy Civil Engineering Services. The following firms have been invited to participate, having demonstrated expertise in marine engineering for the province of New Brunswick: Gemtec, WSP Canada Inc., Dillon Consulting, CBCL Ltd., Eastern Designers, Exp Services Inc., and Hatch Ltd.

#### Proposal Submission and Evaluation
Interested contractors are invited to submit their proposals in either official language of Canada (English or French). The RFP is available for downloading from the Government of Canada's tendering website. The evaluation of proposals will be based on the criteria outlined in the RFP.

#### Debriefing
Firms who are unsuccessful in the bid solicitation may request a debriefing from the Contracting Authority within 15 working days of receiving notification of their bid's unsuccessful status.

#### Important Dates
* **Publication Date**: 2024-03-26
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-04-09T14:00:00 (Expired)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-04-30
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Not specified

#### Important Contact Information
The Contracting Authority for this project is Atlantic Region Acquisitions. Their contact information is as follows:

* Rachel Miller (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [rachel.miller@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rachel.miller@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: None
* Fax: None

Note: The contact information provided is for the Contracting Authority only. For any questions or concerns regarding the project's requirements or evaluation criteria, please contact the specified person.  End of rewritten text.  ```markdown
